data.title: International Chamber of Commerce
data.meta_description: What is the global footprint of the WCF?  Our members are in 116 countries/territories, from all regions of the world and are the key players in the work of ICC World Chambers Federation.  Joining WCF  When you join the ICC World Chambers Federation (WCF), you become part of the forum that connects chambers across borders, […]
